interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Lion Guard: Return of the Roar
Review Date: 2016/03/29
Store: Max Charles  (Actor),     Rob Lowe  (Actor)    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Meet Kion, second-born cub of Simba and Nala, as he assumes the role of leader of "The Lion Guard," an elite team of animals tasked with preserving the Pride Lands. Follow him as he assembles a group of unlikely heroes: Bunga the honey badger, Fuli the cheetah, Beshte the hippo and Ono the egret. Join them on a thrilling adventure as they use their unique abilities to defend the Pride Lands from predators and maintain balance within the Circle of Life. Bursting with humor, music, beloved characters and heart, THE LION GUARD: RETURN OF THE ROAR is a must-own for the entire family!', 'Additional Features', 'Digital HD is not included with this product.']
Average Rating: 4.6

reference_summary:
Noah
Russell Crowe  (Actor),     Jennifer Connelly  (Actor),     Darren Aronofsky  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
['Product Description', "Academy Award Winner Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the film inspired by the timeless story of courage, sacrifice and hope. Also starring Emma Watson and Academy Award Winners Anthony Hopkins and Jennifer Connolly, this visually stunning, action-packed adventure from acclaimed director Darren Aronofsky (BLACK SWAN) is hailed as 'one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film'.", 'Amazon.com', 'Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the film inspired by the epic story of courage, sacrifice and hope. Directed by visionary filmmaker Darren Aronofsky.', 'The film is inspired by the story of Noah. While artistic license has been taken, we believe that this film is true to the essence, values and integrity of a story that is a cornerstone of faith for millions of people worldwide. The biblical story of Noah can be found in the book of Genesis.']

['Rango (DVD)', 'Get ready to tango with RANGO, a winner with critics and audiences that’ s "like nothing you’ve ever seen before" (Peter Travers, Rol ling Stone) . Lone Survivor
Mark Wahlberg  (Actor),     Emile Hirsch  (Actor),     Peter Berg  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
['Based on The New York Times bestselling true story of heroism, courage and survival, Lone Survivor tells the incredible tale of four Navy SEALs on a covert mission to neutralize a high-level al-Qaeda operative. The four men must make an impossible moral decision in the mountains of Afghanistan that leads them into an enemy ambush. As they confront unthinkable odds, the SEALs must find reserves of strength and resilience to fight to the finish. Academy Award® nominee Mark Wahlberg (The Fighter) leads an all-star cast including Taylor Kitsch (Savages), Ben Foster (3:10 to Yuma), Emile Hirsch (Into the Wild), and Eric Bana (Munich) in a movie hailed by critics as "unforgettable, tense, and inspiring." (Movieline)', 'Bonus Content:', 'Bringing the Story to Light', 'Bringing the Story to Light', 'The Fallen Heroes of Operation Red Wings', 'The Fallen Heroes of Operation Red Wings', ']]>']

MALEFICENT
Angelina Jolie  (Actor),     Sharlto Copley  (Actor),     Robert Stromberg  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
['Explore the untold story of Disney\'s most iconic villain in this wickedly fun twist on the classic SLEEPING BEAUTY. In an unforgiving mood after a neighboring kingdom threatens her forest, Maleficent (Angelina Jolie) places an irrevocable curse on the king\'s newborn daughter, the Princess Aurora. But as the child grows, Maleficent finds herself becoming fond of the girl. And as the conflict between the two realms intensifies, Maleficent realizes that Aurora may hold the key to peace in the land. Journey beyond the fairy tale in this soaring adventure that is "visually arresting, brilliantly designed" (Andrew Barker, Variety).']

Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Andy Serkis  (Actor),     Jason Clarke  (Actor),     Matt Reeves  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, Action, General
['Gary Oldman, Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke and Keri Russell star in this thrilling next chapter of the Planet of the Apes. It is 2026, and humanity has been pushed to near extinction by a deadly virus. When a group of survivors desperate to find a new source of power travel into the woods near San Francisco, they discover a highly evolved community of intelligent apes led by Caesar (Andy Serkis). The two species form a fragile peace but dissention grows and the groups find themselves hurtling toward all-out war.']

Into The Storm (DVD)
Richard Armitage  (Actor),     Sarah Wayne Callies  (Actor),     Steven Quale  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
['Into The Storm (DVD)', 'In the span of a single day, the town of Silverton is ravaged by an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes. The entire town is at the mercy of the erratic and deadly cyclones, even as storm trackers predict the worst is yet to come. Most people seek shelter, while others run towards the vortex, testing how far a storm chaser will go for that once-in-a-lifetime shot. Told through the eyes and lenses of professional storm chasers, thrill-seeking amateurs, and courageous townspeople, “Into the Storm” throws you directly into the eye of the storm to experience Mother Nature at her most extreme.', ']]>']

Stella
Bette Midler  (Actor),     John Goodman  (Actor),     John Erman  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
['From DOWN AND OUT IN BEVERLY HILLS to BEACHES, superstar Bette Midler has wowed audiences worldwide with her music, humor, and charisma! Midler now delivers a most engaging performance in her latest hit, STELLA! Tough and fiercely independent, Stella discovers that she is pregnant after a brief relationship with Dr. Stephen Dallas, but is too proud to accept a marriage of convenience from him or her well-meaning best friend, John Goodman (O BROTHER, WHERE ARE THOU?). Ready to face life without regrets, Stella single-handedly raises her loving daughter Jenny (Trini Alvarado). Through the years, the two share a very special relationship, until Stella faces the truth -- that she cannot provide her daughter with a life of advantages her wealthy father can give her. STELLA is a warm, humorous, and thoroughly entertaining film that speaks to the heart of all audiences!']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest:** The user continues to explore a diverse range of films, focusing mainly on drama, biblical epics, and visually striking animated features, with a growing interest in action narratives highlighting moral complexities and human resilience.

- **Notable Preferences:** They appreciate films that emphasize significant themes such as courage, sacrifice, and hope, favoring character-driven stories that explore complex relationships. Their recent engagement with comedic narratives indicates an appreciation for uplifting themes and strong character bonds.

- **Director and Actor Preferences:** The user admires directors and actors who blend mainstream appeal with profound ethical themes, with recent interactions showcasing their enjoyment of strong performances and dynamic characters, even in comedic settings.

- **Viewing Format:** They maintain a preference for DVDs, relishing the tactile experience of physical media, enriching their viewing rituals across varied genres, including drama, comedy, and action.

- **General Attitude:** The user consistently exhibits high satisfaction with movie selections, frequently rating films five stars and providing enthusiastic reviews that emphasize storytelling quality and character development.

**Trends:** Their cinematic interests are increasingly leaning toward narratives addressing ethical dilemmas, blending action, humor, and thoughtful storytelling. The user’s appreciation of impactful family-oriented films signifies a broadening of their exploration of human resilience and character bonds, aligning with their established preferences.
